benchmark_details.name: PythonSaga
benchmark_details.overview: PythonSaga is a new benchmark featuring 185 hand-crafted prompts with balanced representation of 38 programming concepts across diverse difficulty levels.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To address the limitations of existing Python code generation benchmarks in terms of diversity and difficulty level.

data.source: Curated from GeekForGeeks and LeetCode platforms.

methodology.calculation: Measured as the proportion of benchmark problems successfully solved by a model.
methodology.interpretation: A model is successful if at least one of its generated solutions passes the defined evaluation criteria.

ethical_and_legal_considerations.consent_procedures: Explicit informed consent obtained from all human participants.
